description: Built on their high performance TR1 chassis, this is their most rugged and versatile trail shoe. TPU overlays fight abrasion while a synthetic suede harness supports and protects the midfoot. Seamless lining and foam provide Cadillac-like comfort for cruising through any terrain. If you want a new-school “rugged outdoor shoe”, they suggest the TR1 Scuffler.
name: Astral TR1 Scuffler - Mens
